title: Jake Gyllenhaal Triple Feature
description: The versatile Jake Gyllenhaal does everything from mainstream spectacle to off-the-charts bizarre. There's no better proof of that than this triple feature of Gyllenhaal flicks, which include the thrilling big-budget disaster movie THE DAY AFTER TOMORROW, the quietly droll dramedy THE GOOD GIRL, and the polarizing cult classic DONNIE DARKO.
